title: Account logged in by someone else

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Hello, I am here to discuss something strange that occurred to my account. This happened to me a day ago while I was on my way back from vacation I got a call from a friend I play league with saying that he thought someone was on my account. So when I got home I logged on to see if any messages have been sent to him. By my surprise I saw that there were messages being sent to him which kinda spooked me out so what I did was change my password hoping that would help now I'm awaiting to see if he logs on to my account again.  P.s I have not given my password to anyone.

replies.body: Finding someone else on your account can be scary, and I'm glad you've taken steps by changing your password.  I recommend checking our[ account security ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204048924-Security-tips)guide to help ensure your account is protected.  Let me know if you find anything amiss with your account!
Thanks for replying I have checked out the account security and will let you know if I find anything amiss.
